title: Kyle Mohan!
description: Pro drifter Kyle Mohan and motorsports manager Efrain Olivares join us to talk about golf accidents, drinking at Road Atlanta, ridiculously powerful rotary engines, the Toyata Pro/Celbrity race at Long Beach, hovercrafts and old Ford SHOs.
author: matt@thesmokingtire.com (Matt Farah & Zack Klapman)
content:encoded: Pro drifter Kyle Mohan and motorsports manager Efrain Olivares join us to talk about golf accidents, drinking at Road Atlanta, ridiculously powerful rotary engines, the Toyata Pro/Celbrity race at Long Beach, hovercrafts and old Ford SHOs.
